body.name: Under Cabinet Light, 48 LED Motion Sensor Light Indoor, 3 Color Temperatures Dimmable Closet Light, Magnetic, Stick-on Under Cabinet Lighting Wireless, Rechargeable Night Light for Kitchen, Counter
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 15 hrs 59 mins
features: 【New Upgraded Under Cabinet Light】With 48 scientifically arranged LED lamp beads and the light guides and shades to reduce glare and blue light, the light of under cabinet lighting is softer and brighter. The brightness of closet lights is up to 150 lumens, providing brighter and more uniform lighting for any space, no glare, no video flash, and no harm to eyes.

【Multiple Lighting Modes】The kitchen lighting has 3 kinds of lights: warm light-natural light-white light (3000K-4000K-6000K). You can also step-less dimming to meet your needs. In addition, the cabinet light has 3 working modes- ON mode: keeps lighting all the time/AUTO mode: Automatically turn on after sensing motion in the dark/OFF mode: keep turning off. Therefore, you can used them as normal night light for closet/cabinet/drawer or motion sensor light.

【Intelligent Motion Sensor Light Indoor】 Premium motion light indoor use passive infrared technology (PIR) to detect motion. Lights will be auto turn on by motion activated within 20ft/120° in the dark or in the dimmer surroundings. And then auto turn off after 25 seconds to save your electric bill if no more motion is activated. You can also set this led light to ON mode for constant lighting.

【USB Rechargeable and Eco-Friendly Design】: These rechargeable cabinet lights have built-in high-capacity battery, easily charged via the USB-C cable(included). After fully charged, the wireless under cabinet lighting can last for about 4~6 hours of continuous lighting when you make it (ON)mode, and 60~90 days under motion sensor mode(activate 10 times a day). Say goodbye to unfriendly and costly disposable batteries, enjoy an environmentally friendly and money-saving life.

【EASY TO INSTALL】Built-in Magnet to Stick on Any ironwork: This under cabinet lighting wireless can stick on any ironwork like under shelf, or you can use the included adhesive tape to stick the motion sensor night light on any non-iron article surface, like Warobe, counter, hallway, stair, etc..When need a charge or change place, you can take the closet light off easily anytime. The convenient hallway light, under shelf lighting, under the cabinet lights, stick on lights.

【2 Years Warranty】We back our product quality with a 2-year warranty service. If you encounter any problems when using our dimmable night light, please feel free to contact us. We are committed to solving any problems, please buy with confidence.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Reasons to choose Lifnatty under cabinet lights Lifnatty under cabinet light is a motion & light sensor light with adjustable brightness, easy to install, and can be charged directly with USB-C. It is a very practical closet light in life.

Multiple color temperatures & stepless dimming Lifnatty cabinet lights have three color temperatures that can be adjusted, and you can adjust to your favorite and comfortable color temperature according to your needs or different environments. The color temperature of white light is 6000K, the color temperature of natural light is 4000K, and the color temperature of warm light is 3000K. On this basis, you can also perform stepless dimming on it. It can meet your different needs in various environments.

Various Lighting Modes Lifnatty under cabinet lights have three different light modes to meet your different needs. If you are using it as a studio or travel night light, you can turn on its constant light mode to make your space brighter and warmer. It is also a motion-sensing night light. You can install it in stairwells or kitchens where you don’t stay often but need lights when you pass or enter. It will only light up when it senses the movement of objects under dark conditions. And it will automatically turn off after 25 seconds on. It saves trouble and is convenient.

Large capacity battery, easy to charge Lifnatty under-cabinet lights have a built-in 1500mAh high-capacity battery, and the charging method is usb-c. It can be charged with a power bank, computer, laptop or adapter. The charging is very convenient and durable. When you turn on the always-on mode, it can be used for about 4-6 hours, and the motion-sensing mode can be used for up to 30-90 days. Note: This product does not come with an adapter.

Brighten up your wardrobe The closet light is powered by a built-in large 1500mAh battery (the product does not come with an adapter), making the LED lights wireless and unplugged, and providing you with lighting in areas with limited or no electricity. Comes with 3M self-adhesive stickers and magnetic stickers, allowing you to stick it to walls, cabinets, bedroom stairs and more in seconds.

No need to fumble in the dark When you need light, you will find this wireless night light is very suitable for use, no need to connect to the power supply, soft light and sensitive sensor. Most importantly, there is no need to recharge frequently. This cabinet light can be used in many places, making your life more convenient.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great lights for my crawl space
reviews.reviewText: I have a two-section crawl space, so this light is perfect for it. Very easy to install with the self-stick magnet pieces. The motion sensor works very well and I don’t need to manually switch them on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I can see
reviews.reviewText: I have long hallways and at night gonna turn the TV off it’s dark in the living room I have to go down a long hallway to get into my bedroom and I have these at the baseboard in three different spots down the hallway and this lights my way I’m an older woman I’m 73 so this lights my way to my bedroom so I think these things are a fantastic invention I just need more so thank you to whoever Thought about this and produced him very very goodbye

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: You need to be very close to the sensor for it work and the light goes off very quickly unless you're moving all the time. Also it needs recharge very often. At this point it's just there under my cabinet and I almost forget it's there.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice, but devours batteries
reviews.reviewText: These look really nice & provide a light source in a dark hallway with no power outlets, but they devour batteries. I’ve had these 6 months and have had to change the batteries 3 times already.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Functional Solution
reviews.reviewText: This works so well, exactly as described. I needed a less-bright light in my bathroom, where I don't have an outlet. I love the different color settings, I use the yellow at night to not wake me up too much. The motion sensor actually works really well, but doesn't stay on too long. I've had it up for a few weeks and haven't had to charge it yet. I didn't even need to use the magnet stickers, as it stuck to my metal cabinet. Overall an awesome product, highly recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Night lights when cruising
reviews.reviewText: Night lights for your cruising cabins.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Motion sensor saves the batteries!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased these for a bathroom area we were remodeling & the light switch was far from the entrance. Worked perfectly so I purchased more for my camper cabinets so I could see the contents easily. I then purchased more for my kitchen cabinets that were deep & difficult to see in. I had tried several other lights for my kitchen cabinets but they weren't motion activated & burned up the batteries quickly. The motion activation works great & they come with 3m tabs on the back to hang or they work sitting on a shelf or table top. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for stairways, easy to recharge.
reviews.reviewText: Installed in a dark staircase leading to basement. Turns on the minute my foot hits the landing, and stays lit till I get to the basement. Well worth the money. Had to recharge battery, very easy. Take light off magnets, use supplied usb cord, remount.

reviews.reviewTitle: Alumbrado tenue para caminar de noche
reviews.reviewText: Perfecto para ponerlo a 40 cm del piso en pasillo o el cuarto para cuando se levanta uno de noche y no desea prender la luz del techo. Puede uno caminar Perfecto sin encender o despertar a nadie. Se vuelve a apagar en 20 segundos. Excelente

Light not functional right out of the box. Power switch was "on", likely killed the lithium battery. Will cost me more in time and gas to return this then the light is worth. Buyer beware, junk product.

Muy satisfecho con este producto. Al recibirlo pensé que iba a ser de mala calidad ya que el platico se siente barato. Lo compre porque las baterías son externas y eso me garantiza que el rendimiento sea mayor. Para mí sorpresa superó mis expectativas con otras luces se este tipo tenía que estar recargando 1 vez por semana con estás paso el mes con la misma carga. Los sensores funcionan muy bien y alumbra lo suficiente con una luz cálida muy elegante. Los uso para dar iluminación a las escaleras y están al nivel del piso.
